attributes.action: Call on speaker of the house John Bercow to resign.
attributes.background: John Bercow has brought a level of controversy to the role of speaker of the House that is unprecedented. His Bias intervention has left the Government embarrassed with a close ally and the future prosperity of the UK economy at risk.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Speaker is a personal decision for the Speaker, and is therefore not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament.  

If you like, you could sign the petition below, which asks the House of Commons to debate a vote of no confidence in the Speaker:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183279
